summary: Add workflow-local storage capability to Ruby SDK, allowing users to store and retrieve data scoped to the current workflow execution. Request sketches using `Workflow["myValue"]` syntax similar to thread-local and fiber-local variables.
userImpact: Users lack a convenient way to store workflow-scoped data, forcing them to use workarounds instead of idiomatic storage patterns.
proposedFix: Implement workflow-local storage accessible via `Workflow["myValue"]` syntax, similar to existing thread-local and fiber-local patterns.
keyQuote: like thread-local and fiber-local, a user can use `Workflow["myValue"]` to get or set workflow-local data
